name: Princess Nabilah
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Semoga dimurahkan rezeki, sihat dan kuat selalu, dan capai semua impian. I wish you all the best and many mores, love you sayang! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do. Cliche kan ..
text3: But then I stopped and fikir kejap.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
